2131.subject: NURS
2131.descrlong: The student develops an electronic portfolio that will include the application of  Obstetrical, Gynecological and Pediatric concepts. This course will be taken concurrently with the student's OB/Gyn/Peds Community College nursing program course and seeks to promote, nurture, and grow the connection of concepts between the Community College nursing program and the CSUMB nursing program.
